title: Contextualizing Generated Citation Texts
abstract: arXiv:2402.18054v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Abstractive citation text generation is usually framed as an infilling task, where a sequence-to-sequence model is trained to generate a citation given a reference paper and the context window around the target; the generated citation should be a brief discussion of the reference paper as it relates to the citing context. However, examining a recent LED-based citation generation system, we find that many of the generated citations are generic summaries of the reference papers main contribution, ignoring the citation contexts focus on a different topic. To address this problem, we propose a simple modification to the citation text generation task: the generation target is not only the citation itself, but the entire context window, including the target citation. This approach can be easily applied to any abstractive citation generation system, and our experimental results show that training in this way is preferred by human readers and al

translated_title: 生成引文文本的情境化处理
translated_abstract: arXiv:2402.18054v1 公告类型：新的 摘要：抽象引文文本生成通常被构建为一个填充任务，即使用一个序列到序列模型来训练生成一个引文，给出一个参考论文和目标周围的上下文窗口；生成的引文应该是有关参考论文的简要讨论，与引文上下文相关。然而，通过检查最近基于LED的引文生成系统，我们发现许多生成的引文是参考论文主要贡献的通用摘要，忽视了引文语境关注的不同主题。为了解决这个问题，我们提出对引文文本生成任务进行简单修改：生成目标不仅是引文本身，还包括整个上下文窗口，包括目标引文。这种方法可以轻松应用于任何抽象的引文生成系统，我们的实验结果表明，以这种方式训练更受人类读者和欢迎。
tldr: 生成引文文本时，不仅考虑引文本身，还要考虑整个上下文窗口，包括目标引文，以解决生成的引文忽视引文上下文焦点的问题。
en_tdlr: When generating citation texts, not only the citation itself but also the entire context window, including the target citation, should be considered to address the issue of generated citations ignoring the focus of the citation context.
